person.persName: Henry C. Leavall (Christian County, KY, farmer and prov govt conv rep )

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sally A. Clardy Leavell in Christian County on November 15, 1855. Father of Joseph D. Leavell and Elizabeth Leavell. Farmer in Christian County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Christian County in 1850. Farmer in Christian County in 1860. Employed Samuel R. Richeson as overseer in 1860. Owned twenty-five enslaved persons in Christian County in 1850. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
